content:
SAFE is a digital healthcare platform operated in partnership with Mayo Clinic.
Our mission is to make healthcare more accessible and reduce the cost of care at scale. We are currently working on a revolutionary Connected Diagnostics platform that has the potential to transform how primary care is delivered.

We are looking to hire an experienced developer whose primary focus will be FHIR. Experience with Epic and/or Mirth a plus, but not required. This is a full time, permanent position; remote work from anywhere in the US is OK. For further details and to apply, please visit the following link: https://www.indeed.com/job/sr-fhir-hl7-integration-software-developer-10c2b2d7fae028c9
